mapper.select: select a."stationCode" as "stationCode", a.code as code, a."stationCode" as stationCode, round( a.value/b.precision :: NUMERIC, 2 ) as value, a.method as method from nw_monitorpoint_hour a left join lc_app_dim_indicator b on a.code = b.code where a."stationCode" = #{stationCode} and a.code = #{code} and a."analysisDate" between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}'
